content.detailedDescription:
1. in the back yard of my house on the western edge of small city. i had an 8" telescope set up to view the orion nebula and also to view messier 81/82 near the constellation ursa major. 

2. i looked up and quickly glanced, naked eye, at the constellation of ursa major and registered that there were stars that appeared as a small star cluster just to the south of the constellation itself, and just as i looked away i realized there is no star cluster in ursa major. it's initial appearance was just like a smaller version of the pleiades star cluster.I re-acquired the lights due south of the lower two stars of the dipper as it moved between (apparent size) the 2 lower stars heading north, again with the naked eye.

3.When i first noticed it i thought it was a star cluster. when i looked back at it, it had moved, and was still moving in-between merak and phecda (2 bottom stars of the big dipper). i continued to watch it with my naked eye for 5-6 seconds, and then leaned over and acquired it in the view finder scope of my telescope. 

4. the optic is a 6x30 mm orion finderscope. it has crosshairs and is a straight tube version. i tracked the lights until they disappeared at about tree level height - from trees that are the next block over. in the viewfinder, they still appeared to be 5 lights - 2 on each side and one at an apex of a triangle shape. they were symmetrical, non - blinking, monochrome, completely silent, stayed in formation, and moved fairly quickly in a straight line from south to north. in the viewfinder they were not blurry - but rather small and constant points of light - only started to "shimmer" when it was very low on the horizon and just above the treetops before going out of sight. apparent size, naked eye was about 3 degrees. merak and phecda are a little over 10 degrees apart, the triangle formation of lights was approx. 1/3 that distance from tip to tip. length was equivalent. motion was constant, fairly quick. with the naked eye i watched it move about 30 degrees south to north in approx. 4-5 seconds.

5. felt a little surreal, since i have seen many strange but explained phenomenon in the sky as an amateur astronomer. my first reaction was a little dis-belief at was i was seeing, but then to try and acquire with optical aid - hence the finderscope being used. the only thing i think of that would be a plausible explanation would be migrating geese - it is the right time of year, the right formation, and the right flight path. some strikes against the geese explanation are 1) totally silent - geese usually make honking noises in flight that you can hear - as long as they are flying low enough to hear them 2) since its apparent size was roughly 3 degrees, that would put these geese very high up. the viewing conditions were clear, good atmosphere transparency, no visible clouds, and in other words moderate to good astronomy viewing (viewing iii). at that height if city lights were reflecting off of their bellies i would not think they would be able to reflect enough light back to appear as bright as they did naked eye (though the lights could not be described as "very bright", they were just about as bright as the average of the star brightness in the dipper). 3) speed of movement. if the geese were that high (no sound, small area of 3 degrees for whole formation, and point-like light rather than "fuzzy orb" reflection appearance) then they were moving pretty quickly since it moved about 30 degrees in 4-5 seconds.

6. the object started to shimmer in a typical fashion for objects low in the sky. normal atmospheric effects causing the lights to shimmer. it then abruptly faded from view.
content.summary: 5 white light triangle. no sound. observed through telescope's spotting scope as well as naked eye.

content.detailedDescription:
according to witness, the event happened in early spring of either 1969 when he was 6 years of age or in 1970 when he was 7 years of age.  he said his dad got him a 22 cal. rifle when he was about 3, and taught him to shoot and hunt.
 
the incident occurred in a desert area about 30 miles east of reno at about 10 am in the morning.  witness said he and his dad arrived at the location driving their volkswagen van.  the weather was described as a clear day with a blue sky and crisp, clean air.  witness said his dad stayed with the van to drink beer, as he always did, while witness would go hunting rabbits his 22 cal. rifle.  witness said a minute or so into the hunt, he shot a rabbit, retrieved it and continued to hunt. according to him, it was just a minute or two later that he saw another rabbit and started to take aim when something within his peripheral vision about 8 to 10 feet away off to his right side caught his eye.  he said he was startled and just turned his head slightly to the right and realized he was looking at a "thing" standing there, staring at him.  he described the "thing" as about his the same height as he was, which he estimated to be about 4 feet tall, very skinny with long arms, large head with large dark eyes, and was grayish in color.  he said he was immediately frightened but had kept his rifle pointed in the direction of the rabbit.  witness said he remembered keeping the "thing" within his peripheral vision and noticed that it started turning its head slightly to its right in the direction of the rabbit witness had intended to shoot.  however, the "thing" then turrned its head back looking at him and simultaneously began raising its right arm,held straight out.  witness said he became extremely frightened and thought the "thing" was about to do something to hurt him, so he swung his rifle in the direction of the "thing" and fired one shot into the upper right side of its chest and it fell to the ground.
 
as quickly as it happened, witness said he dropped both his rifle and the rabbit he had shot earlier, and ran back to the parked van, crying and screaming for his dad.  he said as he got to the van, his dad, who may have been intoxicated from his beer drinking, began scolding him, wanting to know why he was crying and not hunting.  witness said he tried to explain to his dad that he had shot a"thing" and may have killed it.  his dad purportedly responded by telling him he was only supposed to shoot rabbits, not anything else, and began asking him what he had done with his rifle.  he said he told his dad what had happened as he continued to cry and pleaded with his dad to go back and see if they could help the "thing" he had shot.  however, he said his dad was adamant and "drunk",and ordered him to go back to get his rifle and the rabbit he had shot and to keep hunting.  witness said he did as he was told and went back, found his rifle and the rabbit he had shot earlier, but the "thing" was gone.  he said he looked around the area where it had been laying after he shot it to see if there was any blood but saw none.
 
the very next thing he remembers is that as he was standing there where he had shot the "thing"when he suddenly saw a craft hovering just above the ground an estimated 200 feet away.  he said he  could only  describe it as a cylinder or "cigar" shaped object, metallic looking and as long as a football field.
 
the next detail he remenbered was being in some type of a "room"with beams like frame work and what appeared to be a lot of dust.  he was frightened and crying, and the next he remembers is being in the back seat of the van, alone in the dark, crying for his dad who wasn't there.  he said he now believes "they" still had his dad.  the next that he remembers is he is with his dad in their van driving home in the dark.  he said he asked his dad why it was dark since they always left the hunting area in the afternoon so they could get home and  clean their rabbits before dark.  witness said he recalls his dad ignoring his questions and telling him he was going to clean the rabbits they had hunted that day when they got home even though it was dark.
 
witness said he is certain that he and his dad had both been abducted and somehow had been returned to their van.  he said that his dad never said anything to him about the event again and would never discuss that hunt again.
 
he said he never got over the  experience, has felt guilty all of his life for shooting what he now believes was an "entity" and has never forgiven himself.  witness said he has seen and felt the presence of something watching him ever since his experience and is now willing to undergo regressive hypnosis with the hope of finding out what did happen after he shot the "entity" and if there was some meaning to why it happened.
 
witness underwent medical examiniations by different doctors recently due to problems he began having with his throat and ears.  at least one of the doctors thought there was type of implant in one of his ears.  since he doesn't have health insurance, he couldn't pay for the procedure to remove it. 
 
witness is convinced he has been taken many times, threreafter, and even believes he was in a craft which was just controlled by the placement of hands on the inside surface of the craft, there were no controls or anything tangible seen.
 
about the first week of november 2012, while on land north of his homr he said he saw creatures, and has visions and dreams constantly.
 
witness told me he has had a spot of gray hair which showed up right after his experience, and as a kid, people that saw him wanted to know how a boy his age could have gray hair.
 
he said there is much more he can tell us now and that he trusts me.
content.summary: Witness believes that he shot an entity while rabbit hunting as a child.  subsequently he saw a craft and believes he was abducted and taken onboard.

content.detailedDescription: My wife an myself walked two blocks over to the mini mart for a late nite snack as we headed back toward our home we noticed what appeared to be a pulsating star. upon our return we grabbed a couple pairs of binoculars. we had to say it was really wild  so i phoned a freind over on the other side of town he  waked into back yard an saw it also about that time my wife said hey theres another one  and we got to looking and ther was 3 spread out through the sky in the south we then further inspected the nite skies and noticed 4 to the east.The first one disapeared on us only to be replaced by another one. we all get the feeling they are closer then the stars it is hard to say how close however. it is eery not having a clue as to what we are witnessing,it is twelve pm my wife is still watching them move ever so slowly over us as so is  other local townsfolk  it like being invaded by pulsating colored orbs of light.We are still watching this strange occurance as i end this reporting
content.summary: Looking into  the southern sky  tonite my wife and i noticed what looked to be a star flashing 4 colors then we saw 7 more 4 to the east also

content.detailedDescription: I was walking over towards the front door and as i looked up out of the screen door i saw two bright orange-yellowish bright lights hovering at a distance; one diagonally above the other; just seemed to float in midair and remained stationary for about 2min. then the lower light slowly descended and the intensity of the light began to decrease and eventually went out as it descended; then the higher light descended and slowly flickered out. there was a police helipcopter flying around in the area at the same time shining it's searchlight down onto the streets below but it did not seem to notice the bright lights off in the distance or at least it did not react to them at all.
content.summary: Two brightly lit orange-yellowish lights hovering diagonally off in the distance

content.detailedDescription: My 3 year old grandson & i were pulling into the san diego safari park, & i noticed the hot air balloon they use for guests to go up & get a good view of the park.  i rolled down my window of the car to get a good, clear shot of it, on this warm, slight breezy day, about 74-76 degrees, with a few, wispy clouds.  i was so focused on the balloon, i really didn't notice the 2 different colored lights on the right side of the balloon, until i got home & looked at the pictures i took of the day!  what are they?
content.summary: Didn't see them, until i saw the picture i took of the hot air balloon!!

content.detailedDescription:
I left my gopro camera to shoot time-lapse session at 17:12 pm on 31st of march, 2013,  to shoot at 5 second intervals. camera was placed on a second floor window sill pointed almost directly towards northern sky above hamilton, ontario, canada

after image review later that same day, i noticed a bright flash of light in upper left corner on three consecutive images taken at 19:41:46, 19:41:51 and 19:41:56.

bright white point of light appeared to be moving in se direction, while gaining altitude and changing direction to w in a curve

fourth and fifth image show the same object, but without intense light, with some sunset light reflecting off of its surface.

sixth image in a sequence, timestamped at 19:42:16 shows a bell shaped object.
content.summary: Shot a long time lapse session at 5 sec intervals. ufo appears on 6 consecutive photos

content.detailedDescription: I was using the bathroom when lightning caught my eye through the window shade. so i opened the window shade. then looked out the window facing west, when a green ball of light caught my attention. i could not identify the green ball of light. i saw the ball of light hovering over large a metal building. approx 1/4mile away. i watched it hover left to right over building in a north to south direction. then the ball of light rose up above building then back level with the building, hovering almost ground level in a north to south direction. i was memorized by the strange weird green ball of light. ball of light was visible for approx 20 seconds. finally the green ball of light faded away suddenly and was gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Green ball of light hovering over large metal building moved left to right, up and down

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my back porch, i live on the edge of the san gabriel mountain range, there is nothing behind my home but forest, there are very few lights in the area. i noticed as i was looking to the sw a flickering blue/white light that seemed to be coming towards us from estimated 5 miles away. it may have been going away from us, i could not tell, but it seemed to coming towards us headed in a north direction of travel.  i noticed it and joked, "check out the ufo", i thought it was an aircraft, normal one, it stayed at aprox the same spot in the sky for about 5 seconds and it disappeared, quickly faded out.  it did not go below the horizon, or at least it didn't seem to.  the light was in the sky for longer than 5 seconds because i noticed it before that, once i focused on it and pointed it out, it was only visible for a few more seconds and was gone.  never seen anything like that before. i would guess it's location aprox above mt gleason.  how i felt? i couldn't explain it away, it's the first time i've seen something and knew something was not right. somebody else had to have seen it as well.
content.summary: Flickering light appeared to be coming at us, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my patio about 10pm saturday night taking photos. i noticed a glowing green ball on the ground. i zoomed in on it and it looked like 2 eyes, just green glowing eyes on the ground. i got a little scared so i went inside to look at the photos and you can see a green orb right around the area of the landing. it did not look like a cat or any other animal. i went back out and took more photos about 10 minutes later and it was gone!
content.summary: Glowing green orb landed and looked like 2 glowing eyes, then gone

content.detailedDescription: Called outside an saw 5 orb lights some where floating others where moving in circles just or just hovering, i was then sent to get a camera, but when i returned 3 had simply vanished according to my mother. one floated off in the distance an the other seemed to float away.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Called outside an saw 5 orb lights

content.detailedDescription:
2 miles east of little america and 16 miles west of green river, wyoming.

  approx. time was 6:48 am,on my way to work i noticed a glare from my left, as i turned to look, i could not believe what i was seeing. a vertical pulsating beam of light greenish in color, i was approximately a mile and quarter south of the interstate driving east, the beam descended with quick bursts of even brighter light same in color, and ascended back up, the event lasted around 80 to 90 seconds.  although the distance from the interstate was just little over a mile, it was still softball size and not hard to miss. i hope others will come forward and report the event.
content.summary: Vertical pulsating green or turquoise beam of light

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday night, 16 march 2013, starting at 2150 to 2209, i recorded the following lights crossing the mesa, arizona skyline. i was on the second floor of an apartment complex on lindsey and us-60. i was going to close the blinds in my daughter���s room when the incident occurred. the reason i find this interesting is that there are 2-red vertical lights that slowly moved from the north-west to the east. possibly coming from the anthem, cave creek area headed toward superstition mountains.  an aircraft is supposed to have green lights on this side. red was the only light visible throughout the whole recording and it was steady and never rotated or moved out of position. at about 11-minutes into filming the top light begin to fade than went out. at 15-minutes 20 seconds the second light began to fade than went out. near the end of the filming i do show an aircraft landing at falcon field.  i have 21-years in naval aviation as an aviation ordnanceman working on fixed & rotary wing aircraft and there weapons; and 6-years in the aerospace industry. three of those were manufacturing military helicopters and three were in iraq & afghanistan as a contractor with numerous army medivac units. i have been in combat situations both in the navy and as a contractor. with all this said, i know for a fact these are not military flares or other ordnance. as far as an air ship, balloon or other type of aircraft, i am 99% sure it is not. i do not know of any aircraft like this or that has formation lights like this and/or then extinguishes itself. 
there were no clouds or haze this night. it was a comfortable cool air. as far as a shape, i could not tell. i did try to look for something that would identify its shape and transparency but did not find any evidence of it. it was too far away to determine if it had a sound. i can only guesstimate the object(s) were 8-10 miles from me.
content.summary: Two-red vertical lights moving from nw to e.

content.detailedDescription: This even was witnessed by two people that i know of. first witness reported that he observed 5 ufo's that were hovering in the sky and then took off vertically. the witness heard all the dogs barking in the neighborhood and went outside and looked up and saw an object(light) hovering in the sky and then take off so fast he couldn't tell where it had gone. no noises were heard during both events.
content.summary: Saw the ufo hovering in the sky and then ascend veritcally

content.detailedDescription:
On march 30, 2013 at around 1:00am, i ran outside after hearing my children screaming. they were pointing up at the sky, and when i looked up at the sky i noticed 4 circular objects beaming orange lights off of them. i immediately thought they were ufos because of the manner in which they hovered over us. they were close enough to appear large to us, but i really couldn't tell you just how big. i'd say they appeared the width of a mini-van. 

as they hovered away, they got smaller until they disappeared. another one then showed up and disappeared. just then, 3 more showed up in the sky, making them 8 total. they were all coming from and going towards the same direction.  the last three that showed up in the sky formed a triangle, to only then disappear before our eyes.

we were all very nervous about this encounter as it was something we could not explain.
content.summary: 8 circular objects with orange lights shine down on worcester, massachusetts

content.detailedDescription: At 1:33am i was driving west on grace street when i observed a object that was above me. i stopped my car to observe this object, which had a solid red light flyingh slow me. now there was only one light (unlike a plane, which has blinking lights.) i also noticed that this object was cone shaped (it blocked out a few stars, that is how i seen a shape.) this object seemed to move toward new york city, so i got in my car, went up  grace to leonard st to central avenue to palisdae street to hoboken to follow this object. i lost it on 14st street. it seemed to disappear over the hudson river.
content.summary: Red light solid cone shape object flying over jersey city

content.detailedDescription: We were walking around the circle downtown indianapolis and the first time around we noticed a couple stars that appeared "double" and talked about them as we walked. ten minutes later after a walk around downtown we made another lap around the circle. when we were at the point where we noticed the double stars before we looked to see if they were still there, they were gone. we then noticed a giant triangle shape with 'dull gray' light emitting from the corners with what appeared to be faint light all the way around the triangle hovering over the city, it was hard to make out an altitude but it was pretty high in the sky. the shape stayed stationary long enough for us to see and question what it is and if each other actually saw it. the triangle then slowly moved west and out of our view behind the buildings of downtown. from our perspective it was hoovering over the conrad hotel, then moved west, southwest out of our sight. we ran to try to get a better view several blocks away but it was gone by the time we made it to a place with a full view of the sky and horizon. the shape appeared to me to be hovering horizontal with the ground, one point pointing in the direction it was flying but from my wife's perspective she described it as like viewing a pyramid from the side...
content.summary: Giant triangle with dull grey lighted corners moving slowly west over the city of indianapolis

content.detailedDescription: Too long. that-s it!!!
content.summary: a group of around 30-60 "orange orbs" coming from east toward west and then turn to the south and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work and turned onto eastern road heading east. after turning on to eastern i noticed bright lights directly over the road about a mile ahead. i first thought it to be a helicopter until i realized the color of the lights. there was a bright white light with 2 smaller red lights on either side of it. off to the side of those lights, and separated from them by about 20 feet,was a large bright green light. i drove directly under it and pulled into my driveway which was only about 500 feet past whatever it was. as soon as i pulled in my drive i got out of the car at the road. it was only 4 or 5 hundred feet in the air. it hovered about another 2 seconds and started moving southwest toward rittman. i watched it for about a minute then it just instantly started heading northwest. i watched it head in that direction for 2 more minutes or so before i lost sight of it. there was no sound at all. no blinking lights. i must admit i am a little freaked out by how close it was and not hearing anything at all. i thought for a moment many an rc helicopter because i fly them. that was until i saw it moving many miles away. also when it moved away the green light that was separated from the others was in the lead. they all stayed positioned to each other perfectly so i assume it was 1 thing not multiple. i wish it would of stayed there a little longer cause i was fumbling for my phone to get a pic or something. by the time i got it out it was already too far away for my phone to really pick it up. as soon as i lost site of it i pulled my car to the apartment and went inside. i looked up where to report ufo sightings and that led me here. thank you.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lights hovering over road. i drove under them and parked. hovered above me then flew west.

content.detailedDescription:
While looking at jupiter and determining if i should set up my telescope, i observed in the corner of my eye what appeared to be a dull streak of light.  i immediately assumed it was a meteor, but when i focussed on it, i saw that it was actually three sets of three star-like lights (3 x 3) flying overhead at a very rapid pace.  it appeared to be three objects because each set of three was in the shape of a flat triangle (almost a straight line each) moving simultaneously, but each object (set of 3 lights) was moving separately from the other two objects and changing formation as it flew by.  it was like three birds or jets flying next to each other that constantly changed positions relative to each other.  the observation path started near the star capella (nw) and continued in an e or ne direction and lasted approximately 3-4 seconds until they faded away near the north.
the objects were definitely not meteors because they were changing formation, were moving to fast to be any type of jet.  there was no sonic boom or any sound whatsoever.
content.summary: Three triple-star-like objects flew overhead in formation.

content.detailedDescription: Watching tv when alerted by daughter a ufo come quick. wife daughter myself went outside to view. plane as day we saw it in se sky moving ne a different speeds and a couple hovers it appeared to move how ever it wanted with no effort. a small single engine plane was in area close to object. we watch as it stop for a long moment then with in a split second you could see what appeared that it was going straight up then vanished. new it was a ufo. i had seen almost the same thing in 1974 in area about 60 miles from here on same type starlit night, had never thought much of seeing something like this. a 3rd daughter was at a friends house, had wife go pick her up right away. flabbergasted
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Daughter alerted wife,myelf to object in se moving ne orangish glow flying differnt speeds

content.detailedDescription: Objescts were shot yestarday at dawn by samsung smsrphone by a friends wife, no one saw notjing until today my friend chequed her photos and ask her, she was shocked, objects were invisible to naked eye .    puerto san jose beach guatemala
content.summary: Shocking ufo discovery in photographs tajen in puerto san jose guatemala thursday dawn

content.detailedDescription:
camara fotografica digital nikon  s3300 wide 6x zoom 16,0 megapixles
hora argentina de buenos aires 12pm.
siguiendo mariposas para fotografiar y bajar en la computadora me sorprende ver objetos circulares de color blanco y gris.Otro siguiendo un avion comercial.Sucedio en el patio de mi domicilio y en la terraza la fotografia del avion perseguido por un objeto
content.summary: Dos objetos en forma circular

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready for work on the morning of 3-27, and a really nice looking sunrise started to come up so i decided to take a few photos. normally when i want to take a picture of something i snap off a bunch of photographs in a row. typically this gets me at least one of them that turns out really nice. i never heard or noticed anything during my picture taking. it wasn't until after i cropped and posted one of them on my facebook page in the morning on 3-29 that i noticed something that looked like a reflective glare above the sunrise. this prompted me to restore the sequence of photos that i took to see if this was apparent in all photos. at first going through the sequence nothing made itself apparent until i got aprox half way through them. i am attaching the last part of the sequence of photos that i took, 10 in all. which show this object or glare rising and changing position throughout the sequence. i am guessing that i took all of the last 13 pictures within a 30 sec time frame. i had no inclinations of anything odd at the time the pictures were taken. i am still not sure if these are just glare or not, but thought it worth someone taking a more educated look at.  since this site will only let me upload 10 pictures i am attaching the last 10 in the sequence. i would be happy to send the rest if requested, and i kept the whole sequence of 25 photos if wanted as well.
content.summary: Taking pictures of the sun rise, didn't see anything until i looked at the pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was in my hobby room about 11:30pm on wednesday, march 27, 2013 on the 2nd story which has an unobstructed view of the sandia mountain range. i turned out the light and looked towards the mountains as i do every night and saw an object over the mountain range which is over 10,000 feet that had very bright red and green lights but the red lights were brilliant red and were actually beams of light in the shape of very long triangles. one at the top of the object pointing up and one at the bottom pointing down to the ground. both beams were 50-100 feet long and had very sharp points at the tip. the green lights must have been very small because i didn't notice them anymore. it moved back and forth over the mountain top then came down a little and started moving west over the houses in my direction so i immediately ran down the steps and out into the back yard which took about 15 seconds but it had disappeared. no sound, no planes, no helicopters. just silence. there is a tram north of this sighting but the object was farther south and looked nothing like the tram as it was moving around and flying over the mountain. there is also a restaurant and light towers up there but all were north of this sighting and they are stationary. i have seen lots of planes and helicopters in this area, even hot air balloons, but i have never seen anything with beams like that.
content.summary: Object with two red triangular shaped beams moving back and forth over the sandia mountains near albuquerque.

content.detailedDescription: I heard unprecedented rumble for about ten minutes before i looked out the window to check the source since it seemed to be approaching my location in suburban detroit. i immediately noticed a very unusual shaped object that seemed huge -- for a moment i thought a jet plane was crashing down toward me and i was alarmed to say the least. this was roughly triangular, with lights on 5 points of the vehicle. i kept watching, noting a white one that glowed in the (apparent) front, and on either side were two amber lights on each (apparent) wing. it seemed like a movie to see this monstrosity, then i realized it was not moving quickly at all and i glanced further out the window and saw a whole series of these light formations. some were triangular like the one overhead and others were small circular amber-colored smaller lights that flickered around the line of aerial curiosities. i was anchored to the floor it seemed, i couldn't take my eye off this remarkable sight...At the same time i was dumbstruck in awe at the string of these unprecedented airborne illuminated objects. i heard additional sounds that turned out to be real helicopters that suddenly swarmed overhead, i sensed these were "our" vehicles, reacting to the invaders. i was home alone, and turned on the tv to several cable channel news stations and no mention was made. the whole line of objects was so remarkable i couldn't believe that thousands of people must have heard this noise and/or seen these lights. i have never seen anything like this before and i've seen unexplained phenomena throughout my life. the next day i checked online and sure enough folks from the detroit/se michigan had phoned the tv and newspapers carried it too. i've not since heard the rumble nor seen any peculiar lights or airborne craft of inexplicable design configuration. this seemed to me to be as obvious as the sighting over phoenix awhile back, there was no effort to block visibility. if these loud bright objects represent the next-generation stealth aircraft, then we are in some deep fertilizer, friends. this was as stealthy as a roman candle display on the 4th of july!!
content.summary: Observed huge triangles slowly float/hover west going east. enormous humming sounds.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife took these photos in knoxville, tn driving back from our daughters gymnastics class. she said the object hovered in the air glowing a red/orange hue then turned a dark grey color and shot up in the sky disappearing into the clouds. 

she first noticed the object because it seemed of place. the sky was a blueish/grey hue and the object stood out because of its bright and vibrant colors.

when i first noticed the object i was unsure what it was.

the object eventually faded into the sky and clouds and was no longer visible.
content.summary: My wife took these photos in knoxville, tn driving back from our daughters gymnastics class. she said the object hovered in the air glowing a red/orange hue then turned a dark grey color and shot up in the sky disappearing into the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: In seaside oregon i stepped out my back door and was looking west toward the ocean when i saw a bright red orb type object moving upwards from the horizon. it was not blinking or flashing in any way and there was no other color other than red (this is the second time i have seen this type of object.. the last sighting was a couple weeks earlier and the object moved horizontally during that event). the object was very bright so drew my attention to it immediately (as did the previous event). i had my son come out and look. he brought binoculars and we both viewed it with them. i could hear no noise like aircraft or helicopter. we watched for about 3-4 minutes as it got higher in the sky, it looked as if it may be getting closer to us and we hoped for a better view to try to determine what it could be but it was lost in the cloud cover. my reaction was calm as i have seen closer objects in the past.. curious as to what it may be as this is the second time i have seen it. during this event it seemed to move slower than the first event but that could be the difference in travel direction (first one was horizontal this one vertical). would really like to know what it is i saw.
content.summary: Bright red orb? type object moving from horizon upward

content.detailedDescription: I just stepped outside to look at the stars, since it's pretty night, with frogs singing, and noticed what i thought was a satellite moving north, which sped up and turned toward the northwest and while doing so, another point of light came in from the east, and then flew along with the first point of light to the w/nw while accelerating, and then disappearing in the distance. i've watched hundreds of satellites, and these were not satellites, because they don't speed up or turn or change direction. they were also too high and too fast to be conventional planes.
content.summary: Looked at first like a satellite, but then curved more nw, speeded up then another joined it

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were traveling south on why 72 around 9:30 pm when we noticed an oval shaped object on the west side of the road.  i have never seen a light in that area and remarked to my friend that i had never noticed a light out there before.  he remarked that he also had never noticed a light in that area either.  the object was hovering above the tree tops.  it had large white lights around the edge and i remember thinking that they reminded me of those old christmas round bulbs and they were very clear.  there were two lights in the center and the right light would go on and off.  i had this sense that the object was hovering at an angle so you could see all of the lights.  we were in a hurry to complete a mission and continued our drive but regret not stopping and observing.  my friend recalls the object differently than me.  he thought it had color lights and that it moved and shimmered somewhat.  he  is color blind so i do not know if this would account for the difference in what we each observed.  i thought i was seeing a ufo  and after reflecting  on the event believe that it was a ufo.  ft leonard wood is nearby and i am sure that the helicopter came from there.
content.summary: Appeared oval with large white lights all around the edge with evenly spaces between the lights.  there were two lights in the middle and the right light would go on and off.  a helicopter  followed shortly after.My friend

content.detailedDescription: Was leaving friends house and got about one mile away when i noticed three bright red lights in a staggered horizontal formation about seven hundred feet off the ground. at first it looked like three radio towers of different heights through the tree canopy.As i moved into a clearing i could clearly see them. at first they were moving at about fifty mph.As i reached the clearing they were rapidly accelerating to a speed above two thousand mph. they quickly moved to the south out of sight.No noise during the entire event.Had the feeling i was seeing something not from this planet. also ten years of naval aviation experience and well informed of what we have and what it looks like in the sky day or night.
content.summary: Three horizontally staggered red lights over rural east orlando.
